channel.title: [HELP] Coding on a 317 server [HELP]
channel.description: How do I add those screen picture things that come up when you click on a skill?? Like when I click on the Defence skill, that scroll type thing comes up on the screen and says what skills you need to wear a certain item and stuff? If you can tell me that would be [b][size=36pt][u]VERY[/u][/size][/b] helpful! And if I posted this in the wrong place then just tell me :D

item.title: [HELP] Coding on a 317 server [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @zachwizzy zachwizzy
item.description:
@zachwizzy wrote:

Study your client.java to get a feel for what coding is about before you start coding. Tutorials that people have done on Moparscape is a great start to coding. Gl on your coding adventure
